trans-unit.source: Represents a safe handle to the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 登錄的安全控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use platform invoke on the native `RegCreateKeyEx` Windows function to obtain a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle> object, and then use it to create registry keys with the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用平台叫用原生`RegCreateKeyEx`Windows 函式，以取得<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle>物件，並再用它來建立登錄機碼具有<xref:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.FromHandle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 代表要使用之已存在控制代碼的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to reliably release the handle during the finalization phase; <see langword="false" /> to prevent reliable release.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示確實在結束階段釋放控制代碼，否則為 <see langword="false" />，用以免除確實釋放。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeRegistryHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。
